org.apache.flex.swf

Class SWF

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.swf.SWF
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISWF

    public class SWF
extends Object
implements ISWF
    The implementation of a ISWF object. Most of the ISWF properties are encapsulated in the a Header member, but we don't expose the Header at the interface level.

      • getMetadata

        public String getMetadata()
        Description copied from interface: ISWF
        Get the Metadata text. This is a Metadata property.

        The Metadata tag is an optional tag to describe the SWF file to an external process. The tag embeds XML metadata in the SWF file so that, for example, a search engine can locate this tag, access a title for the SWF file, and display that title in search results.

        Specified by:
        getMetadata in interface ISWF
        Returns:
        metadata XML text; null if Metadata tag doesn't exit.

      • getTopLevelClass

        Description copied from interface: ISWF

        Specified by:

      • setMetadata

        public void setMetadata(String value)
        Description copied from interface: ISWF
        Set the Metadata text. This is a Metadata property.

        The Metadata tag is an optional tag to describe the SWF file to an external process. The tag embeds XML metadata in the SWF file so that, for example, a search engine can locate this tag, access a title for the SWF file, and display that title in search results.

        Setting a non-null value will also set FileAttributes.hasMetadata to true.

        Specified by:
        setMetadata in interface ISWF
        Parameters:
        value - Metadata XML string; null value will remove the Metadata tag on the SWF.

      • setTopLevelClass
